title: Bulk buy beef
creator_contributor_role: Meat and Livestock Australia, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Food - Preservation
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Cookery, Australian
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Cookery (Meat)
description: Episode number 4 of Series "Meat makes the meal". This film clearly illustrates the variety of meat cuts available to the purchasers of bulk beef. The preparation of a side of beef from commercial cuts to domestic cuts to suit the preference of the purchaser is demonstrated. The advantages of home freezer use are emphasised.
related_objects: Series; S01262; Meat makes the meal; Active; 1974
